Summary Note:
The RM has known Egger Schmidt Rieder since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
With a career spanning nearly 21 years, Egger Schmidt Rieder has established himself as a key player in the industry.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Egger Schmidt Rieder is married to Melanie. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1997, Egger graduated from Akademisches Gymnasium Innsbruck with a secondary school diploma.
Egger graduated from Graz University of Technology in 2003, completing his higher education.
Occupation History:
Egger Schmidt Rieder is a 45 year old and comes from Austria.
At Baxter BioScience, Egger Schmidt Rieder held the position of Research Scientist from 2004 to 2008, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to Octapharma AG as a Biotech Startup Founder, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2009 to 2013.
At Octapharma AG, he worked as a CEO from 2014 to 2025, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 360000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns house in Saalfelden, where he resides. It is worth 1430000 EUR.

He purchased house in Spittal an der Drau, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 970000 EUR.
He inherited a significant sum of 180000 EUR from his grandmother, a respected Stock Trader, in 2005, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
